page.title: Fingerprint ID Firm Cogent Soars in Debut
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Shares of Cogent Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=COGT.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">COGT.O</A> soared 50 percent in their market debut on Friday after the fingerprint identification company's initial public offering priced at the top end of its range.
